reviews.review: no no no no no no no no no no no

Actually pretty good if you get a group of autistic mates from school and run around thinking your Stewie2k while all hard-carrying that one terrible guy. Sorry Jake. Then there's always the humble top fragger- you're welcome Evan. Then the idiot who tries to reply to his girlfriend while in a 1v1; don't even need to say the name. Then the kid who is really inconsistent but sometimes pops off and trust me you won't hear the end of it, and that's me btw. Then there's the slap bang average bot who sold his mother deucing GPU to "persue other hobbies" so lost all his gaming abilities... sorry Luke.

Recommended if you want to play with russians all the time, I think I have played with literal babies, that don't know how to read or anything, but know how to curse in russian. 

Important note, if you want to get killed, because your teammate was shouting his lungs out, when he died, this is the game for you.

Teamkilling is a thing so.. yeah, that explains it
